description: Help children and young people with a Masterâ€™s in Child and Adolescent Psychology.This course is ideal if you are interested in careers working with children and young people. You will gain an in-depth understanding of current issues in child and adolescent psychology and learn to apply this theory to real-life settings by undertaking a placement. You will also conduct a substantial piece of research in child and adolescent psychology and choose from one of three optional modules.
duration: 1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
